title: strI vESamu dAlcina
sahitya:
strI vESamu dAlcina kAraNamu sEvakuniki delisEnipuDu


anupallavi

  nA veta dIrpa cetagAka nI viTuluNDu mariyAda gAka


caraNam 1    munu paTivalE nija rUpamu gaikommA canuvunarammA nAyeduTa niluvumu 
ninu bAdhimpanu nijamuga nammu sanakAdi vinuta nA mora vinumu
    caraNam 2    kEshavarAya ninujUDa manasAya nAshramamu dIrcakuNTE maccidAya 
shrIsha vEgamE rammIcAya AsatO mrokkEda mOhanakAya
    caraNam 3    sadAshivanuta su-caritra sadAshiva mitra parama pavitra 
sadAshivAkAra bhaktArtihara sadAshiva vinOda nityAnanda
